extracted_playbook.title: Update SICAM SCC
extracted_playbook.description: Update SICAM SCC to version V10.0 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Update ETI5 Ethernet Int. 1x100TX IEC61850
extracted_playbook.description: Update ETI5 Ethernet Int. 1x100TX IEC61850 to version V05.30 or later. The firmware ETI5 V5.30 is included in the 'CP-8031/CP-8050 Package' V5.30.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates Using Siemens Tooling
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the provided security updates using the corresponding tooling and documented procedures made available with the product. Consider using automated means if supported by the product.

extracted_playbook.title: Validate Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Perform prior validation of any security update before applying it, and ensure supervision by trained staff during the update process in the target environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access with appropriate mechanisms such as firewalls, segmentation, and VPN.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Environment According to Operational Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines to run devices in a protected IT environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
